description:
This is all-in-one solution for those who want to change their live by enrolling in MBA program. This course covers: choose of the MBA program, rankings analysis, documents preparation, TOEFL, GMAT preparation, application filling and essay writing. Why do you need me? Because I already passed all parts of the application process.
My name is Andrei Li. I have 13 years of equity trading experience. In 2009 I decided to get an MBA. My choice was IE Business School in Spain. In a short time period I passed GMAT and TOEFL test. The problem was with essay. I red tons of books about the issue and found solution of how to crack essay problem. So the solution is easy and effective. That is what I am offering you in the course.
Therefore I have a knowledge and experience including some secrets of how to get accepted. I got accepted to three business schools and received two scholarships. Therefore, with my course you will be in safety while looking at your MBA future.
title: How to be accepted to an MBA program?
